about_the_game: This is the demo for Sigma Draconis, a sci-fi colony building game which focuses on building and resource management.  The demo allows you to play on one of the two regions available in the full game, with a limited set of buildings as research is disabled.  Steam achievements are also disabled.  The demo offers around 1-2 hours of gameplay, and games started in the demo can be continued in the full game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any x64 version of Ubuntu
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, OpenGL 3
  • Storage: 220 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Most x64 Linux distros should work, only tested on Ubuntu.
